speaker: YOU
text: Your sister was meeting someone at the Blue Moon. Big man, gray suit. Works for someone named Castellano.

speaker: VIVIAN
text: Castellanoâ€¦ Eleanor mentioned that name. She was terrified of him.

speaker: VIVIAN
text: He runs half the waterfront. Real estate, shipping. The kind of man who makes problems disappear.

speaker: VIVIAN
text: Find the proof, detective. That's what I'm paying you for.
